评论详情: Oversized, but not sloppy looking, and comfortable. Ordered white, and it’s more of a winter white/cream color instead of bright white, as pictured. I like the color, though, and the styling with the zippers on the side. Medium weight, which I like as well. Haven’t washed it yet, so can’t comment about shrinkage, etc.

This is a very nice shirt it’s not sweatshirt material but it a good quality material and the rib type design in the fabric makes it truly unique! It’s oversized but true to your size if you want a small snug fit I would suggest sizing down one but it is long enough to cover you butt and you can wear leggings and feel confident and comfortable in this shirt ! I love it the color is really pretty too !

评论概述: Flourescent orange! But fits great and cute.
评论详情: Size large. I’m and 12/14 size typically and buy xl as I don’t like tops fitting tightly around my mid-section. This large fit perfect though. 5’0”, 155#, 38DD. Fits great. I’d love other colors. Size large. I gave it 4 stars because the orange is not what I had expected. Florescent orange, so I’m not sure I’m keeping this. It is a thin sweatshirt. It’s not soft on the inside, so I wouldn’t say it is a true sweatshirt like what i think the majority of us picture a sweatshirt to feel like. The zipper detail is cute and I will definitely get another color.

评论概述: One of the best buys this year
评论详情: UPDATE: I loved this so much that I bought the Kelly green, black, and wine colored. I love all of them except the wine colored one. The color does not reflect what’s represented. It looks more burnt red than a rich burgundy. Also it runs big so after getting the blue in XXL, I downsized to XL for the others. Great buy. The gold zippers make it look like a quality product . The wine colored one—not so much. See pics. ****************************************************** I had to order more colors of this stylish shirt bc it drapes very nicely and gives a “boxy” body type some nice lines. The color is brilliant. The zipper is quality. The shirt has some warmth w/o being heavy. It’s very well made. It runs big so get your true size. Seriously grab all of the colors you want bc it’s a great shirt. My favorite this year so far.

The texture of the shirt gives it more interest than regular sweatshirts.  The side zippers definitely add flair!  The length is wonderful at 28” from shoulder near collar to bottom.  Covers my behind cheeks.  Washed in cold water and dried on low heat.  No shrinkage or wrinkles.  I am between a medium and large,  ordered in medium according to size chart and other reviews.  Fit was perfect for 5’5”, 163 lbs with some belly to hide.  Loved it so much that I ordered another in steel blue.

This isn’t a sweatshirt. It’s not sweatshirt material and I wouldn’t consider it for relaxed wear. It’s cute, the color is nice. Not what I was wanting. The length is tunic, and it’s fairly loose, but not oversized.

The top is quality material that is mid weight so not too warm and perfect for fall. The price is great. I bought an xl and the fit is oversized but still flattering because it doesn’t look sloppy. The side zippers add extra style. I washed on cold and laid flat to dry with no shrinkage.

I get so many compliments every time I wear this shirt! The beautiful green color and gold-tone zippers give this warm and comfy medium-weight sweater an upscale look. No surprise, as ANRABESS is my favorite Amazon brand for women’s clothing. Highly recommend!

The color is very accurate. The fabric is medium to heavy weight. It comes shrink wrapped, so you will need to wash it to get all the wrinkles out. It does not have any cotton in it. It is 65% rayon, 33% polyester, and 2% elastane. It is machine washable in cold water, hang to dry. It has slits on the side which can be opened and closed with a nice looking gold color zipper. The zipper is very well made. One thing to keep in mind when ordering. This is, as it states, "Oversized". If you wear extra large, get a large. If you wear a large, get a medium, if you wear medium, get a small. It will STILL be oversized. I am 5'8" 138 lbs. I do like my sweatshirts on the roomy size so I started with a Large. WAY too big. Returned it and got a medium..still way too big. Returned and got a small. It fits perfectly, still with amply room to spare. It can easily be paired with jeans or dress slacks. I think you'll like it!

I got this as a gift. It fits great, true to size. I would order your size do not size up as its already oversized. I love the side zippers that way it gives you more room around your waste. Great color and warm as well. Good quality for the price.

I really like this oversized top. The material is on the thicker side, but still nice and comfortable. It's true to size and color. I like the gold zipper detail. The picture makes it look as if it has pockets it doesn't.

Not the typical sweatshirt! The zippers on the side definitely dress it up. And the zippers look great both zipped closed or left unzipped. I rarely wear sweatshirts, but I like these so much that I ordered 5 different colors!
Although it’s not the thickest it’s long enough for my 5’9 cover my butt
Cute and comfortable. Zipper sides are cute and make it a little special
Love this way this looks on. Top is thin but not too thin and seems of decent quality. Fit as expected and loose and comfortable
This top is so comfortable and it is the perfect fit of loose and trim. Feels amazing and is now one of my favorite tops. I've ordered to more.
The sweater is well made and the fabric gets softer with wear. It’s a great length for leggings.

This shirt was too small and scratchy on my skin.  If it was a little bit bigger, maybe it wouldn’t be so scratchy.  The 2 zippers were gold toned and I prefer silver toned.  Also, the dark pink color did not look good next to my skin.  I think those shirt would be a better fit for a blonde or redhead who has smaller measurements than me.  My hips are 45” and my waist is 48-50.”

Absolutely love this top. The quality belies the price. Flattering fit and the gold zipped dresses it up. I like the slightly longer length in the back. Liked it so much I went back and bought the rust color.

Absolutely love this top! Super flattering, I am large chested, but feel so comfortable in this top. I loved it so much I bought another. Material has a nice texture to it. Material isn’t thick and not to thin.

I loved the color of the womens oversized sweatshirt and hasn’t faded after a couple of washes. The body of the sweatshirt is very wide so I layer it with an underneath shirt. Cute shirt, size up because it shrinks in length after drying
Very well made and comfortable.

I am tall and plus size and I LOVE this shirt. I have it in 3 colors and bought one for my 14 year old for Christmas. It is a great length-not oversized on me but perfect! Perfect for work or going out! I highly recommend this shirt!
Love that the side zippers give you options with styling. Lightweight, not too loose, just right. Not sweater material, if that’s what you’re looking for. More of a layering piece.
Love the color! So pretty. Long enough to cover your backside. Very comfortable too.

It’s obviously not the best quality, but better than expected for an Amazon purchase. It’s not sweatshirt material, more like a rougher texture and without the fleecy inside that a sweatshirt would have. Nice length covers the booty in leggings and the zippers are nice if you have wider hips.

I’ve received so many compliments on this sweatshirt.  The color is beautiful, the fabric is soft, zippers are a little wonky but I don’t use them so it’s not an issue for me. It runs large so suggest for a more tailored fit to size down.

I have so many pull over tunic tops that are too long, manly in the arms. This top fits perfectly with plenty of room without looking sloppy. Perfect length to wear with leggings. For reference I am 5'2, 150lbs, 40C bust with a bit of belly and ordered the large. I'm pretty certain a medium would have fit as well. I didn't want a tighter fit. Fabric is excellent. Highly recommend. Just ordered a second one, Black Friday deal!!
Liked it to wear
Another slightly oversized top. Works well with leggings. Washes up nicely with no shrinkage. Excellent quality!
Love the side zippers so I can adjust the look and fit of this sweatshirt.

Love this!!!!!!  Rare to buy something online I like this much.
Pretty color. Bought three different colors.
This is super soft and comfortable.  Not heavy but nice for a cool day.
The fabric is good quality. Drapes nicely with adjustable side zippers. Green is gorgeous! Ordering in another color
Super comfortable!  Ordered a large and now I’m going to order another one in medium.

Wow.  I’ve recently lost a lot of weight and have been buying a lot of new clothes. This brand is great and has such quality material.  I have seven of them.  I watch for them to go on sale and snatch them up.

Lightweight material, easy to layer. Love the side zipper detail. Color is exactly as pictured. True to size but could size down. Looks great with leggings or jeans. Would definitely purchase other colors!

Did not know this sweatshirt needed to be dry cleaned.  I may try washing it.  I like that is not very heavy and the color is wonderful
The color, fit and style are great. Feels high quality. It is oversized so expect to style it with tighter bottoms like leggings.
Very stylish and affordable. I have 5 of them in different colors.They are not thick or bulky which I like , I sized down one size and I’m glad I did . Good purchase.
Love this so much I ordered two more. Great quality and fit.
It’s warm and very comfortable. Stylish also

评论概述: This is not a hoodie but still cute
评论详情: For reference, I'm 5'5", 215-220 pounds and wear a 38D bra. I would describe my figure as pear shaped with a long torso. I have a 28" inseam. I carry the majority of my weight in the lower abdomen to upper thigh area. Anrabess is one of my absolute favorite Amazon brands. This sweatshirt is so adorable. It is not a hoodie; it is a crewneck. I love the zipper detail on the side. It adds shape to the sweatshirt; without it, it could look boxy. The zippers seem very sturdy and are, of course, functional. I ordered my true size, which is also the Amazon suggested size. I plan to pair this sweatshirt with leggings, gold bubble earrings, and Cushionaire Women's Bailey Lace Up Sneakers in green/white.

I like the fit and the material. It does run large. I usually wear an CL, but it was too big. The L fits perfectly.

cute top but def not sweatshirt material as i had hoped for...waffle-like  :  (

I like that it fits.  It looks great.  I always buy an XL for my 5'6", and 160 pound body.  I like things large.The cons are that the zipper is a heavy metal zipper and I has scratched my hand, arms and body as I dress. It should be a nice soft nylon/plastic zipper.  It is awful to wash because it makes a racket in the dryer as it bounces around.  I live in an apartment so noise is a problem.  I wish I had returned it.
I  like everything about it.

I love this top. I pulled it out of the sack and immediately wore it. My top is black. I wore it with black leggings, and I wore gold jewelry because the zippers are shiny gold. It was a great combination. I will buy another one in a different color because I like the fit and the unique it is with the elevated zippers. I love this top! I love this top. I pulled it out of the sack and immediately wore it. My top is black. I wore it with black leggings, and I wore gold jewelry because the zippers are shiny gold. It was a great combination. I will buy another one in a different color because I like the fit and how unique it is with the elevated zippers. Love this top! *I have since purchased it in LIGHT ALMOND AND KHAKI. The two new tops have been paired with white leggings and khaki colored wide leg pants.
The zippers on each side look fashion forward. Comfy material . Use would be as a sweatshirt ! Casual wear.

Love these stylish shirts. The zippers are fabulous allowing for more warmth or less depending on your comfort zone.  I got the green and black in my regular size Med.  I get tons  of compliments on them.  Worth the money.

While it might not be the softest sweatshirt, the weight is quite nice and on the heavier side. The zippers on the side are functional and great to adjust the fit of the sweatshirt depending on the bottoms you’re wearing or, realistically, how you’re feeling that day. This has washed well. It is true to size for an oversized look or size one down for more fitted.

I bought this in black, white, gray, pink, and green. I bought some in my real size (XL) because I’m 5’3/220lb size 16 curvy/big boobs, and some in Large.  The XL fit “oversized” so not clingy at all.  The large was more “fitted”, but in a good way.  Also- the side zippers are functional and on both sizes, I unzipped them half way for a cute “swingy” look. With my high waist jeans and leggings leaving the zipper slightly open adds a cute look. I’m a short gal, but have a long torso, and these still covered my bum (a must for me When I wear leggings!) plus a few inches.  If you carry your weight in your belly, get your true size.  If you are more “hourglass” with your weight distribution more even, size down.  But even if you size down, the zippers will allow you to lessen the clinginess.Quality: are these a cuddle up fleece? No. But are they comfy? You betcha! Just because I want to wear leggings, doesn’t mean I always want to look like I rolled out of bed.  These sweatshirts are what I consider to be the “elevated” kind that instantly makes you look “put together”.  Want  casual? Throw some sneaks on.  Want classy? Throw some pointy toe flats, booties or even heals/wedges.  I’ve worn them both ways and have gotten compliments on the shirts.  People like the colors, and the gold zippers really show up and make this a “dressy” sweatshirt.  I hate calling it a sweatshirt.  It’s really so much better than that.These work for everyone.  I’m  a 44 year old mom/teacher and have 2 teen girls.  One of my teens (145 lbs 5’5) has borrowed them twice now.  On her the XL was way too oversized, but she loved the L fit and wore the pink one to school with sneakers and said friends and a teacher loved it.  :)
I've now ordered four in different colors. What I like about it is that the fabric is firm enough that it doesn't cling, so if you've got a little tummy or a bum to hide these are perfect.
It’s fits TTS if you like a loser fit go up a size
I love the colour and the large gold zippers do have decided to give it as a gift.
Perfect fit. Great material. Will order another different color.  Very happy with this purchase
Love the top.  Unfortunately fits very large and had to return
It was not as expected. The fabric is rather still and the color is not as expected. I'm only keeping it because I work outside and can layer another thin shirt under it.

This shirt is so cute. I generally wear XL because of my pear shape hip area needs more room.  The open zipper allows extra room thru the hip. I bought a size L which fits perfect. The lower Hip Band measures 22 inches across the front and the same across the back band = 44 inches when zipper is closed. Purchased black and rust colors, true to color chart. Have not laundered yet
Quality martial, but fits a little boxy. May need to size down. Overall it's a nice sweater super warm and heavy (in a good way).

This item is very oversized and the fabric is rather stiff. I am 5’7” and 145 and got the small. I really liked the side zippers but ultimately returned this item due to the fabric and body styling.

I purchased size medium in "green." I'm normally between a size M and L depending on the fit, and after reading several reviews, settled on an M. The size was perfect, not too fitted but not as oversized as it is on the model (which was fine by me). Loved the micro ribbed texture, it adds a little bit of interest. I loved everything about it except the color. The green was darker than I had hoped. A previous reviewer shared photos of the green and it looked more teal, but the one I received was closer to the stock photo, leaning more forest green. Ended up exchanging it for the gray and am very happy with that one. Now I want it in a few other colors! My only wish, if I'm being picky, is that the zippers were silver rather than gold.
Like the heavy material. Great for winter

Super comfortable. Looks great.. only complaint is that the color brown isn't the same shade as the photos online.

Fits true to size. Great length for leggings in the fall. It doesn’t smell great out of the package, but I assume a wash will take care of that before wearing. Just a heads up, the zippers are gold tone. They looked silver to me in the pics, or I didn’t look closely enough. No big deal, though.

评论详情: Love this sweatshirt - it’s a great weight, washes beautifully and is roomy but has some flair with the side zippers to make it interesting.  You can dress it up or down with a necklace or scarf or leave it just plain.  Very versatile.  I bought a few additional colors.  You can’t go wrong for the price.
I thought this oversized shirt was a favorite for comfort and softness. It wasn't soft at all and it tends to run a little small. No problem with the seller or delivery.

Nicely made, although the zipper pull was broken. Still, I reordered and even bought a different color. They fit perfectly, loose enough for leggings. I really like the texture and weight of the fabric. Great selection of colors. 5’3” 125# size small.
This is my second purchase of this sweatshirt. I first bought the grey and then wanted olive as well. Love both. I get a lot of compliments and love wearing it.
Like it because it’s different with the zippers on the sides.
This top fits nicely and the fabric is thick and extremely comfortable.  I like that the top is longer like a tunic and the rust color is perfect for the fall months.
I didn’t like the zipper on the sides. The weight of it was another issue.
Comfy & cute.
Color and style are great. I wear an XL and need a Large or Medium. Unfortunately I am stuck with it so I can only wear it at home...which defeats the purpose.
I love the sweat shirt & side zippers.  The fabric is great.  I really like the color & hope they have this green in smaller size and petite. It runs large!

I've purchased three of these sweatshirts in the last month in Khaki, Navy Blue, and Red.  Color-wise, I'm not sure if my computer screen reads differently, but the "Red" color appears on my computer screen as a dusty pink/rose and the "Khaki" color looks like a tan, almost packing box brown color.  In person, the "Red" looks more like a salmon orange/pink while the "Khaki" looks more like camel tan.  The blue was as expected.I think these sweatshirts are a very nice dupe of the Varley Manning style, of which I own two in black and charcoal grey.  The difference is the Varley is a more substantial, heavier fabric and the side zippers are a nicer quality.  Otherwise, this is a great sweatshirt for a fraction of the price (Varley is 3x the price) and I wholeheartedly recommend them.  I've washed them (did not use the dryer, but hung to dry) and they still look great.  I usually wear Mediums, but took a Small in this - which is still roomy enough to wear a t-shirt underneath (I'm 5'3', 150 lbs).

This is not a regular sweatshirt. I was pleasantly surprised that this side zip top looked more polished and not sloppy. The black has gold zippers and can definitely be dressed up. Nice weight, not thin. 5'7", 160 pounds. 38B, 30 waist, 40 hips. I ordered an XL, it's oversized but not too bad. I'm going to wear it with leggings and boots. I think it would also look nice with jeans.

As previously stated by another reviewer this tunic is oversized and that was fine with me. I also purchased a different color one size down and it’s more form fitting but not at all tight and the zips on both sides can be adjusted to your liking. I hope that helps with any questions about fit.
